title: 大佬，能不能帮忙看一下HMCL的报错，问题在哪
author: 云中寻云
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-5-21 15:44 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// You should try our sister game, Minceraft!

Time: 20-5-20 上午11:40

replies.author: ZX夏夜之风
replies.txt_content:
重要问题：
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
        at dbr.<init>(SourceFile:157)
        at dbn.<init>(SourceFile:394)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:166)
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: Failed to dynamically load library: /home/yun/文档/MC/.minecraft/versions/1.15.2/natives/libglfw.so(error = null)
        at cxm.<clinit>(SourceFile:38)
        ... 3 more
Caused by: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: Failed to dynamically load library: /home/yun/文档/MC/.minecraft/versions/1.15.2/natives/libglfw.so(error = null)复制代码
另外的建议：用全英文（不带特殊符号）的目录再试？

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
删除 /home/yun/文档/MC/.minecraft/versions/1.15.2/natives/ 和 /home/yun/文档/MC/.minecraft/libraries

然后尝试启动
